venue.name: University of New England Blewett Hall 006

item.description:
Join us for the latest season of our $1 Permaculture Movie Nights! An enriching and affordable way to pass a winter's evening with other members of our local permaculture group, these evenings begin with a brief potluck supper and are followed by a newish movie with relevance to ecological living, permaculture and resilience-building.  This year we will be running movie nights once a month, December through April.


UPDATE:  Our February film will be "No Impact Man" (See Details Below)

6:30  Potluck supper (bring a dish to share and your potluck kit - dish/bowl/utensils/cup)

7:00 Announcement (bring any you have!) followed by the movie!

8:00 Brief De-brief and Closing....

The Resilience Hub & Portland Maine Permaculture would like to thank the University of New England Environmental Council for their continued support of this movie series.


About the No Impact Man documentary:

Colin Beavan decides to completely eliminate his personal impact on the environment for the next year.

It means eating vegetarian, buying only local food, and turning off the refrigerator. It also means no elevators, no television, no cars, busses, or airplanes, no toxic cleaning products, no electricity, no material consumption, and no garbage.

No problem – at least for Colin – but he and his family live in Manhattan. So when his espresso-guzzling, retail-worshipping wife Michelle and their two-year-old daughter are dragged into the fray, the No Impact Project has an unforeseen impact of its own.

Laura Gabbert and Justin Schein's film provides an intriguing inside look into the experiment that became a national fascination and media sensation, while examining the familial strains and strengthened bonds that result from Colin and Michelle’s struggle with their radical lifestyle change.

Watch the trailer here.
item.how_to_find_us: Blewett Hall is reached via Parker Pavillion (no. 8 on this map: http://www.une.edu/admissions/tour/upload/pcmap.pdf)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: February Permaculture Movie Night: No Impact Man
